name: ABC Rhymes Online Trivia | Words for Kids | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
at.

	The CAT is AT the vet.

book.

	Let's LOOK for a recipe in this COOKBOOK.

catch.

	Can your dog play CATCH? Does your kitten SCRATCH?

dog.

	The big, black DOG jumped over a LOG.

ears.

	At the ballpark everyone claps and CHEERS. They yell so loud it hurts my EARS.

flies.

	Said the spider to the FLIES: "If you were WISE, you'd flee, you GUYS."

grape.

	The hero wore a purple CAPE. 'Twas just the color of a GRAPE.

hurry.

	Why are mice in such a HURRY? They never walk, they always SCURRY.

ink.

	My writing paper's smooth and PINK. I use a pen with purple INK.

Jill.

	Jack went up the HILL with JILL. How much water did they SPILL?

kitten.

	My KITTEN'S white paws look like MITTENS.

laugh.

	Did you ever hear a GIRAFFE LAUGH? (Me neither.)

Max.

	MAX has STACKS and STACKS of blocks.

nest.

	We went on a bird-watching QUEST. We watched some robins building a NEST.

ox.

	Did you ever see an OX wearing SOCKS? (Me neither.)

questions.text: What starts with P and rhymes with CUDDLE?
questions.explanation:
puddle.

	Rainy day: I splash through a PUDDLE. I squish through the muck and the mire. Back inside: My cat wants a CUDDLE. We sit by a crackling fire.

queen.

	The QUEEN is dressed in gold and GREEN. She's the prettiest QUEEN I've ever SEEN.

rabbit.

	My kitten has a HABIT of hopping like a RABBIT.

string.

	We made two bird kites with WINGS. They soared above us on STRINGS.

two.

	Judy's a Goody TWO SHOES. (That's a prissy person who always does everything right, like Hermione Granger.)

up.

	Fill UP my CUP, Bud.

vote.

	I VOTE that we go by BOAT.

whiz.

	LIZ WHIZZES through the drizzle. Liz is a wiz at mixing fizzy drinks with swizzle sticks.

questions.text: I'm skipping the letter X. What rhymes with MESS and begins with Y?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Well, YES, my room is a MESS.

zipper.

	Barbie said to SKIPPER, "Skippy, please zip up my ZIPPER." "Sure," said Skip to Barbie, "You will look just great at the barbecue." Thanks for taking my quiz and reading my silly rhymes.
